about_the_game:
Project Hoyrá

Project Hoyrá is a narrative Action-Adventure game taking place in a new mature fantasy universe in third-person view, with a realistic art direction.
This soon-available demo will aim at showcasing the "Next Gen" experience that Project Hoyrá will be, being developed on Unreal Engine 5.



Within this new world, a mysterious cataclysm has decimated most of the O'Navlás, who were living as thriving civilizations. Each O'Navlá civlization manipulated elements of nature: thunder, ice, plants, fire, and many more. The magnificent jungles of Hoyrá now harbor old ruins and some devastated lands that showcase the destruction of the past.
In the present world, many small human settlements and cities exist, but people don’t have powers like past civilizations; these humans are called the Natarës.

Traveling through the nature and vestiges, a young hero from an extinct civilization tries to solve the mystery in order to face a new global threat, discovering that he may not be the last of his kind along the way.


More information coming soon!

name: Project Hoyrá Demo
short_description: Project Hoyrá is a Narrative Action-Adventure game in third-person view taking place in a brand new post-apocalyptic fantasy world. In this demo you will play as Elduin, controlling the water element, to try and find a lost civilization supposed to be the last remaining elemental nation.
